Header: Kim Kardashian says she is pregnant again
Content: U.S. television personality Kim Kardashian is pregnant with her second child with rapper Kanye West, she confirmed in a promotional video clip on Sunday May 31 for her reality TV show. Kardashian, 34 stated that she just got the blood test back which reported that she is pregnant. Thereafter, she broke the news to sister Khloe in a video clip for the television show Keeping Up with the Kardashians. West and Kardashian, popularly referred to as “Kimye”, started dating in 2012. Their first child, a girl named North West, was born in 2013. In April, the couple had the toddler baptized in Jerusalem. Kardashian and West, a rapper and entrepreneur who also has his own clothing line, celebrated their wedding last year in a 16th-century castle overlooking the historic city of Florence, which the couple hired for the night for $328,575.
